Instrumentation Control Systems Standards
Introduction
Distributed control systems (DCS), programmable logic controllers (PLC) and safety instrumented systems (SIS) form the backbone of refinery automation. These systems provide continuous monitoring, control, interlocking and data acquisition. Standards here align with API 554 (refinery process control systems), ISA 84/IEC 61511 (SIS), and ISA 50 for fieldbus.
Applicable Standards
API 554 – Process Control Systems: design and integration of DCS, PLC and Human‑Machine Interface (HMI) in refineries.
IEC 61131 – PLC Programming Languages.
IEC 61508/61511 – Functional Safety / SIS.
ISA 50 and IEC 61804 – Field Device Integration (FDI), Foundation Fieldbus and HART.
NEMA ICS 1 / IEEE 518: installation wiring and grounding practices.
Equipment Types
Distributed Control System (DCS): redundant controllers, I/O modules, communication networks, operator workstations and historians.
